TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Wi-LyenHa-wi, title = Wi-LyenHa-wi, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wi-LyenHa-wi} }

S.FORM: == kakiliman == Wi-Lyen.Ha-wi "William Harvey" 1578 a mihca 4 a bulad 1 a demiad-1657 a mihca 6 a bulad 3 a demiad" lecuh i Ing-kow ken-te-cyun-bu-ke-s-tung a niyazu'an u sakakaay a wawa ciniza, Ing-kow 17 lasubu a mihcaan u singangany tu sen-li-sye-cya atu misaydan. maazih niza ku taliyuk nu izang, patusek tu ayzaay a ziday sen-li-ke-sye nu saayaway a palahad. ci Ha-wi sa u labang nu malawamaay ci Tan-mu-s i-s, Ing-kow nu micukaymasay tu sinilaculay mabuwak patizeng tu baluhay a saykay a lice, i cen-cean mtizeng aca tapiingan nu hungti ciniza, nika i pisakaku ni Ke-lun-wi-al, malemed caay ka satebuc ku uzip. maazih tu niza ku taliyuk nu izang atu pihatebud nu balucu' paini tu ayzaay a ziday, u kawaw niza tu sawantaneann a baluhay nu uzip ke-sye a malingatu, tungusay malingatu i16 se-ci ke-sye misabaluhayay tu cacay zumaay kahenulan a sakakapt. katayzaan niza Wi-Lyen.Ha-wi "William Harvey" i 1578 a mihca 4 a bulad 1 a demiad lecuhan i Ing-kow-Ken-te-cyun-bu-ke-s-tung a niyazu', wama niza ci Tow-ma-s.Ha-wi u kakitaan nu itiza, namala cin-cang nu Bu-ke-s-tung. wina ci Cyung-ni u ni Ken-te-cyu-ha-s-tin-lay a wawa tu tatgaynaan ni tow-ma-s.Ha-ke, ci Ha-wi sa u sakakaay a wawa nuynian a luma', zuma iza ku cacay kakana atu lalima ku sabama. Ha-wi i Kan-te-pow-ley nu singanganay tekeday a cacudadan kibisien ku ni pasubana' saayaway, tebanay a nipasubana' 15 ku mihcaan micumud tu cyen-cyaw talakaway a cacudadan minanam tu tusa a mihcaan tu mingikiway tu ising zumaay sakay sye-keay. 1602 a mihcaan, i I-tali-Po-tow-wa nu talakaway a cacudadan aca itawya Ow-cow u singanganay nu talakaway nu ke-sye a picudadan, i singanganay u micici'ay nu sye-cya-ba u pipasubana' ni Pu-li-ke a minanam. ci Ha-wi tini pinanaman, caay ku ngelu' amigingkiw, saicelang sa mikawaw, pangangan han nu kaput tu adidi'ay mitesekay ni micici'ay, sakasa i Ba-pu-li-ke-s mikawaw micici'ay tu izang nu ulat atu "satabu tu ulat tu pigingkiwan, mala u matinengay nu edapay a saydan. uyni a zidayan minanam atu mikawaw, ci Ha-al zikuz patizeng tu husu izang miyatayat a musakamu patusek a tanektek. "u kasakamuan ci Ha-wi micudad i Pa-tu-wa talakaway a cacudadan hawsa, ci Cya-li-lye itiza mala cyaw-su", caay ka tenes, aca ciniza i Ingn-kow Cyen-cyaw talakaway a cacudadan pakala tu yi-sye pow-s-sye-wi, u mihcaan niza 24 hena. makay 1603 a mihcaan malingatu, ci Ha-wi malingatu i Lon-tun mala tacuwacuwaay minngaay tu imelangay, caay ka tenes ciniza atu ci I-li-sa-pay hungti a misaydan ci Lang-s-low.Pu-lang a tataynaan a wawa malaacawa. nayi' ku tataynaay awaw nayi' ku tatamaan a wawa ni Ha-wi. uyni a kalaacawa sakay ci Ha-wiyan a kawawan tabaki ku sipiedap. 607 a mihcaan Ha-wi mizawis tu nu hungtiay luma' nu i-sye-yen a sakaput. 609 a mihcaan, makay hungti ci Tan-mu-s i-s atu hungtiay a luma' i-sye-yen-yen-cang ci Hen-li.A-te-cin-s pow-se a nisiwkayan, ci Ha-wi pakala tu Sen-pa-tow-low-mu-i-yen nu sapicunus tu mikawaway tu misaydan, tawya a mihcaan tu lalud, padekuan a Wi-al-cin-sen pow-se mapatay, ci Ha-li mipakutuy tu niliwanan niza tu nayay a tademaw, malingatu teked tu paisingan. Ha-wi pay lipa kinacaca a demiad mueneng i paisiidaingan tepal nu takal mihahalan tu paisingay, sidait ciniza tu labades nu imelangay, ciniza ku miazih tu cayay kakapah ku cilil nu imelangay, nacaay piasip ahacica ku kalisiw, hina caay piala tu kalisiw nu paisinga nu pakuyucay u nizateng niza, misaydan "paayaw tu pakuyucay". au ciniza ku situngus , mangelu' amikawaw, dadawa mala singanganay a misaydan nu Lunt-un. namalaheci niza ku kawaw tu micici' tu cucu', masuped ku kayadah nu natinengan tu sapingaay tu nu tataynaay a pilecuh, au haca u misiket tu nu ulat husu nu izang, tu pucu', namingay nu kasiiyuan a lalekalan, namingaay tu pucu'a gang. Namahiza, ci Ha-wi caay ku matinengzay a misaydan dada', asaca u midiputa tu tademaw sinizatenganay a Ke-sye-cya. 1615 a mihcaan mala situngusay tu misakamuay ni Lu-mu-lye-en, 1615 a mihca 8 a bulad, ci Ha-wi mapili' mala nu hungtiay a luma'nu i-sye-yen Lu-mu-lye nu musakamuay a tadema. 1616 a mihca 4 a bulad, Ha-wi i pasubayuan a zazan Sen-paw-low a kiwkay capiay nu cacudadan pasumana' tu cudad, saayaway patahkal tu pakayniay culil nu izang. u sapasubana' tu cudad nu lima ku nisulit La-tin a sulit a malepun, imahini masinga tu i ta-Ing-kow a piazihan. i pisakamuan tu cudad hawsa, ci Ha-wi u palalecad ku pasubana', maawas ku picici' tu aadupan a musakamu tu micici' tu uzip nu tademaw sye. 1615年, .

== kakiliman == Wi-Lyen.Ha-wi "William Harvey" 1578 a mihca 4 a bolad 1 a demiad-1657 a mihca 6 a bolad 3 a demiad" lecoh i Ing-kow ken-te-cyon-bo-ke-s-tong a niyazo'an o sakakaay a wawa ciniza, Ing-kow 17 lasobo a mihcaan o singangany to sen-li-sye-cya ato misaydan. maazih niza ko taliyok no izang, patosek to ayzaay a ziday sen-li-ke-sye no saayaway a palahad. ci Ha-wi sa o labang no malawamaay ci Tan-mo-s i-s, Ing-kow no micokaymasay to sinilacolay mabowak patizeng to balohay a saykay a lice, i cen-cean mtizeng aca tapiingan no hongti ciniza, nika i pisakako ni Ke-lon-wi-al, malemed caay ka sateboc ko ozip. maazih to niza ko taliyok no izang ato pihatebod no baloco' paini to ayzaay a ziday, o kawaw niza to sawantaneann a balohay no ozip ke-sye a malingato, tongosay malingato i16 se-ci ke-sye misabalohayay to cacay zomaay kahenolan a sakakapt. katayzaan niza Wi-Lyen.Ha-wi "William Harvey" i 1578 a mihca 4 a bolad 1 a demiad lecohan i Ing-kow-Ken-te-cyon-bo-ke-s-tong a niyazo', wama niza ci Tow-ma-s.Ha-wi o kakitaan no itiza, namala cin-cang no Bo-ke-s-tong. wina ci Cyong-ni o ni Ken-te-cyo-ha-s-tin-lay a wawa to tatgaynaan ni tow-ma-s.Ha-ke, ci Ha-wi sa o sakakaay a wawa noynian a loma', zoma iza ko cacay kakana ato lalima ko sabama. Ha-wi i Kan-te-pow-ley no singanganay tekeday a cacodadan kibisien ko ni pasobana' saayaway, tebanay a nipasobana' 15 ko mihcaan micomod to cyen-cyaw talakaway a cacodadan minanam to tosa a mihcaan to mingikiway to ising zomaay sakay sye-keay. 1602 a mihcaan, i I-tali-Po-tow-wa no talakaway a cacodadan aca itawya Ow-cow o singanganay no talakaway no ke-sye a picodadan, i singanganay o micici'ay no sye-cya-ba o pipasobana' ni Po-li-ke a minanam. ci Ha-wi tini pinanaman, caay ko ngelo' amigingkiw, saicelang sa mikawaw, pangangan han no kapot to adidi'ay mitesekay ni micici'ay, sakasa i Ba-po-li-ke-s mikawaw micici'ay to izang no olat ato "satabo to olat to pigingkiwan, mala o matinengay no edapay a saydan. oyni a zidayan minanam ato mikawaw, ci Ha-al zikoz patizeng to hoso izang miyatayat a mosakamo patosek a tanektek. "o kasakamoan ci Ha-wi micodad i Pa-to-wa talakaway a cacodadan hawsa, ci Cya-li-lye itiza mala cyaw-so", caay ka tenes, aca ciniza i Ingn-kow Cyen-cyaw talakaway a cacodadan pakala to yi-sye pow-s-sye-wi, o mihcaan niza 24 hena. makay 1603 a mihcaan malingato, ci Ha-wi malingato i Lon-ton mala tacowacowaay minngaay to imelangay, caay ka tenes ciniza ato ci I-li-sa-pay hongti a misaydan ci Lang-s-low.Po-lang a tataynaan a wawa malaacawa. nayi' ko tataynaay awaw nayi' ko tatamaan a wawa ni Ha-wi. oyni a kalaacawa sakay ci Ha-wiyan a kawawan tabaki ko sipiedap. 607 a mihcaan Ha-wi mizawis to no hongtiay loma' no i-sye-yen a sakapot. 609 a mihcaan, makay hongti ci Tan-mo-s i-s ato hongtiay a loma' i-sye-yen-yen-cang ci Hen-li.A-te-cin-s pow-se a nisiwkayan, ci Ha-wi pakala to Sen-pa-tow-low-mo-i-yen no sapiconos to mikawaway to misaydan, tawya a mihcaan to lalod, padekoan a Wi-al-cin-sen pow-se mapatay, ci Ha-li mipakotoy to niliwanan niza to nayay a tademaw, malingato teked to paisingan. Ha-wi pay lipa kinacaca a demiad moeneng i paisiidaingan tepal no takal mihahalan to paisingay, sidait ciniza to labades no imelangay, ciniza ko miazih to cayay kakapah ko cilil no imelangay, nacaay piasip ahacica ko kalisiw, hina caay piala to kalisiw no paisinga no pakoyocay o nizateng niza, misaydan "paayaw to pakoyocay". ao ciniza ko sitongos , mangelo' amikawaw, dadawa mala singanganay a misaydan no Lont-on. namalaheci niza ko kawaw to micici' to coco', masoped ko kayadah no natinengan to sapingaay to no tataynaay a pilecoh, ao haca o misiket to no olat hoso no izang, to poco', namingay no kasiiyoan a lalekalan, namingaay to poco'a gang. Namahiza, ci Ha-wi caay ko matinengzay a misaydan dada', asaca o midipota to tademaw sinizatenganay a Ke-sye-cya. 1615 a mihcaan mala sitongosay to misakamoay ni Lo-mo-lye-en, 1615 a mihca 8 a bolad, ci Ha-wi mapili' mala no hongtiay a loma'no i-sye-yen Lo-mo-lye no mosakamoay a tadema. 1616 a mihca 4 a bolad, Ha-wi i pasobayoan a zazan Sen-paw-low a kiwkay capiay no cacodadan pasomana' to codad, saayaway patahkal to pakayniay colil no izang. o sapasobana' to codad no lima ko nisolit La-tin a solit a malepon, imahini masinga to i ta-Ing-kow a piazihan. i pisakamoan to codad hawsa, ci Ha-wi o palalecad ko pasobana', maawas ko picici' to aadopan a mosakamo to micici' to ozip no tademaw sye. 1615年, .
